wwwjob.long_description:
Duties include: · Work with the business to ensure Conduct Risk is managed through a clear and robust framework as part of the risk management framework · Provide guidance and advice to the 1st line to ensure Conduct Risk MI is supported by timely and effective MI · Ensure the Compliance Function have early involvement in key business decisions projects to ensure Conduct Risk is considered and evidenced · Own the resolution of regulated complaints, working with the 1st line to ensure Conduct Risk thinking can be evidenced · Working with the business, identify and deliver a Compliance related training programme. To include annual CBT · Record and evidence all training completed · Develop and maintain effective relationships with allocated first line business areas and liaise with internal and external customers (including third parties) and other business areas as required · Support Regulatory Manager regarding regulatory or legislative change which affects business operations providing clear and timely guidance · Support the Monitoring Manager to ensure upcoming monitoring and assurance activities are highlighted and feed in updates/requirements allocated to the first line are raised and evidenced in meeting minutes · Support Regulatory Specialists in gaining commitment from the business to address any regulatory shortcomings and raise standards of compliance and to develop and maintain good relationship management with designated areas · Develop a framework to review and provide commentary on first line assurance activity · Review and challenge trends
Skills and experience required: · A relevant compliance qualification is desirable · Good business understanding and knowledge of the financial services industry (preferably in the Life sector and/or with an International focus) · Capable of interpreting legal and regulatory documents and adopting a pragmatic approach in ensuring systems and controls are in place which meet the expectations of regulatory bodies or relevant industry standards · Strong oral and written communication skills · Ability to work closely with others to achieve results · Previous experience in a customer facing environment would be advantageous
